text:
Hi Guys,
do you know how I can fetch folder from HS with spaces in the name to my local dev environment?
<@U02BSJ38HFV> <@U02GQFB8YFP> try to select only Design manager
<@U019SN3V7HV> I've never tried it but you can probably use quotes "like this"

hoping on <@UDHT6N5SM>â€™s comment, wrap the entire source and or destination path in quotes <@U019SN3V7HV>

```## pattern 
hs fetch --account=<name> <src> [dest]

## example with spaced name
hs fetch --account=HubSpot @HubSpot/barricade "local/some dir/barricade"```
110% effort response. This is how examples should be
